const sg_bmap_t *  bitmap,

This function assigns a bitmap. See sg_set_bitmap() for details.

const sg_bmap_t *  bitmap,

This funciont clears a bitmap. See sg_set_bitmap() for details.

sg_point_t  dest,
const sg_bmap_t *  bitmap,

This function clears an area see sg_set_bitmap_area() for details

void sg_flip_x ( sg_bmap_t *  bmap)

Flip the x axis of the bitmap (horizontal mirror)

void sg_flip_xy ( sg_bmap_t *  bmap)

Flip both axes of the bitmap (horizontal and vertical mirror)

void sg_flip_y ( sg_bmap_t *  bmap)

Flip the y axis of the bitmap (vertical mirror)

int sg_inv_bitmap ( sg_bmap_t *  bmap,
const sg_bmap_t *  bitmap,
sg_point_t  p 
)

This function inverts a bitmap. See sg_set_bitmap() for details.

int sg_inv_bitmap_area ( sg_bmap_t *  bmap,
sg_point_t  dest,
const sg_bmap_t *  bitmap,
sg_point_t  p_src,
sg_dim_t  d 
)

This function inverts an area see sg_set_bitmap_area() for details

int sg_set_bitmap ( sg_bmap_t *  bmap,
const sg_bmap_t *  bitmap,
sg_point_t  p 
)

This function sets the pixels in a bitmap based on the pixels of the source bitmap

Parameters
bmapThe destination bitmap
bitmapThe source bitmap
pThe point in the destination bitmap of the top left corner of bitmap
Returns
Zero on success
int sg_set_bitmap_area ( sg_bmap_t *  bmap,
sg_point_t  dest,
const sg_bmap_t *  bitmap,
sg_point_t  p_src,
sg_dim_t  d 
)

This function sets the pixels in a bitmap based on an area of the source bitmap

Parameters
bmapThe destination bitmap
destThe point in the destination bitmap to start setting pixels
bitmapThe source bitmap
p_srcThe top left corner of the source bitmap to copy
dThe dimensions of the area to copy
Returns
Zero on success
